column3: I understand that Master Gerolt has crafted a Zodiac glass for you. Should you misplace it, please do not hesitate to come to me.
You've lost your Zodiac glass? It just so happens that Master Gerolt crafted spares, which he bade me give to you as necessary.

It's very unlike him to be this giving, though I hardly need to tell you that. At any rate, here is your replacement glass. Please see that you do not misplace this one─you can never tell when Master Gerolt's generosity will run dry.
Oh dear, it would seem that your hands are full. I shall hold on to the glass until you have room for it.
